mapper.delete: delete from PRODUCT_FAVORITE where pdt_no=#{pdtNo} and mem_no=#{memNo}
mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT /*+ index_desc(PRODUCT_FAVORITE PK_PRODUCT_FAVORITE) */ ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM ( select f.pdt_no, p.pdt_name, p.pdt_price, i.img_path, a.address_si, a.address_gu, a.address_dong from PRODUCT_FAVORITE f left outer join product p on f.pdt_no = p.pdt_no left outer join product_image i on f.pdt_no = i.pdt_no left join address a on f.mem_no = a.mem_no where f.mem_no=#{memNo} ORDER BY pdt_no DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= ${end} ) b WHERE b.rnum >= #{start}
select count(mem_no) from PRODUCT_FAVORITE where pdt_no=#{pdtNo}
select count(*) from PRODUCT_FAVORITE where pdt_no=#{pdtNo} and mem_no = #{memNo}
